name: The Apocalypse Was Last Tuesday
description:
This is my first game and was made as a school project in a total of two months. It is a 2D platformer greatly inspired by the games of Edmund McMillen. Try to survive in this super hard game that will test your limits with completely fair challenges.

Controls:

go left by holding "A" or "left arrow"    

go right by holding "D" or "right arrow"       

Jump by pressing "W" or "Up arrow"                                                                              

Press "R" to restart the game at the first level/or skip cutscenes                 

Press "M" to mute the game                                                 

Press "S" for a surprise                                                                                                                               

Press "Q" to quit the game

P.S. There may be a secret boss hidden somewhere
